    public class SliderWidget
extends SensoryWidget
implements CommandWidget
    Slider widget for displaying an integer value on an interactive or passive slider.
    Author:
    Richard Turner

      • onSensorValueChanged

        public void onSensorValueChanged(int sensorId,
                        java.lang.String value)
        Description copied from class: SensoryWidget
        Called by the controller service whenever a linked sensor's value changes. The panel that owns this widget must be registered with the controller service to receive notifications.
        Specified by:
